Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and Kimball due to mechanical problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and Kimball due to mechanical problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and the Loop, downtown, at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Clark/Lake  to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/University
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via71st, Dorchester, 73rd, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/University.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via71st, Dorchester, 73rd, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/University.

Allow extra travel time.
